00252 namespace {
00254         struct MyTxtStream : public QTextStream
00255         {
00256             MyTxtStream(QString *s) : QTextStream(s, QIODevice::ReadOnly), str(*s) {}
00257             const QString & str;
00258         };
00259         template <typename T> MyTxtStream & operator>>(MyTxtStream &s, T & t)
00260             {
00261                 static_cast<QTextStream &>(s) >> t;
00262                 return s; 
00263             }
00264         template <> MyTxtStream & operator>>(MyTxtStream &s, bool & b) {
00265             if (!QString::compare(s.str, "true", Qt::CaseInsensitive)) b = true;
00266             else if (!QString::compare(s.str, "false", Qt::CaseInsensitive)) b = false;
00267             else {
00268                 int i;
00269                 static_cast<QTextStream &>(s) >> i;
00270                 b = i;
00271             }
00272             return s;
00273         }
00274 }

00276 // templatized functions for reading parameters
00277 template <typename T> 
00278 bool StimPlugin::getParam(const QString & name, T & out) const
00279 {        
00280         QMutexLocker l(&mut);
00281         StimParams::const_iterator it;
00282         for (it = params.begin(); it != params.end(); ++it)
00283             if (QString::compare(it.key(), name, Qt::CaseInsensitive) == 0)
00284                 break;
00285 
00286         if (it != params.end()) { // found it!
00287             //if (it->canConvert<T>()) { out = it->value<T>(); return true; }
00288             //else { // fallback to ghetto method
00289                 QString s(it->toString());
00290                 MyTxtStream txt(&s);
00291                 T tmp;
00292                 if ( (txt >> tmp).status() == 0 ) {
00293                     out = tmp;
00294                     return true;
00295                 }
00296                 //}
00297         }
00298         return false;        
00299 }
